details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.3 File trailer - ID keyword
details.description: The file trailer dictionary shall contain the ID keyword whose value shall be File Identifiers as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.4

rule.description: The file trailer dictionary shall contain the ID keyword whose value shall be File Identifiers as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.4

error.message: Missing or empty ID in the document trailer
